price: 85 Mais aussi Zacharie, Jean-Baptiste, Jésus et Elie. Tous étaient du nombre des vertueux.
arabic: وَزَكَرِيَّا وَيَحۡيَىٰ وَعِيسَىٰ وَإِلۡيَاسَۖ كُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wazakariyyā wayaḥyā waʿīsā wa-il'yāsa kullun mina al-ṣāliḥīna
